listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.3-0 are included:

listitem.simpara: apparmor (46628
dbus (46630
directfb (46631
espeakup (46632
isc-dhcp (46607
java-atk-wrapper (46633
libclass-data-inheritable-perl (46639
libdatetime-timezone-perl (46639
postfix (46636
quota (46637
reportbug (46638
tzdata (46639

listitem.para:
The following updated packages from Debian Stretch 9.4 are included (47126):
acme-tiny activity-log-manager agenda.app auto-apt-proxy bareos batik cerealizer chromium-browser corosync debian-edu-config debian-installer debian-installer-netboot-images dpdk drupal7 exam flatpak freeplane fuse-zip gitlab glade global gnumail golang-github-go-ldap-ldap goldencheetah gosa-plugin-pwreset grilo-plugins hdf5 inputlirc
intercal irssi jackson-databind kamailio kwallet-pam ldap-account-manager libdate-holidays-de-perl libevt libhibernate-validator-java libperlx-assert-perl libsdl2-image libvhdi libvorbisidec lucene-solr lxc mapproxy mbedtls mosquitto mpi4py mupdf needrestart nvidia-graphics-drivers-legacy-304xx nvidia-graphics-drivers-legacy-340xx nvidia-modprobe nvidia-persistenced nvidia-settings nvidia-xconfig ocfs2-tools opendmarc osinfo-db packagekit pcs pdns-recursor plexus-utils prosody publicsuffix python-django python-evtx python-hacking python-hkdf python-mimeparse python-pyperclip python-spake2 qtpass quassel r-cran-readxl redmine remctl roundcube rpy ruby-loofah ruby-omniauth-auth0 ruby-redis-store salt sharutils slic3r thunderbird
tor ust uwsgi vagrant vdirsyncer virt-what waagent wordpress xen xrdp zookeeper

listitem.simpara: The SplitMode setting of systemd-journald can now be set with the &ucsUCRV; systemd/journald/SplitMode (46279).
Fix the template for the &ucsUCRV; update/secure_apt (45950).
Very large LDAP schema definitions could prevent the LDAP server on backup and slave systems from starting. The fix ensures that such schemas are handled correctly (46747).
There was a traceback in the join.log file (46206).
The BIND9 service was sometimes not started by the join script (46206).
A Content-Security-Policy has been added to the portal and server overview sites (45423).
The link in the welcome dialog for sending feedback pointed to a wrong location in the French translation (45874).
The description of the &ucsUCRV; umc/web/piwik has been adjusted to better reflect the actual behavior (46791).
Enhance logging for disabled memberof overlay (46476).
The password dialog that is shown upfront some functions in UMC when using a Single Sign On (SAML) session can now be submitted by pressing Enter (46735).
Fix umc-server executable permissions when updating the package during system setup (46847).
A link pointing to the Univention Privacy Policy has been added to the UCS activation process (46742).
The deprecated child-src directive has been removed from the Content-Security-Policy (45599).
Fixed permissions of cache directory (47094).
Categories were not translated (47072).
The deprecated AppManager class is not used anymore in the code (44542).
univention-app update now accepts --cache-dir to use a different directory for downloaded meta files (47021).
When changing the App Center server, update all installed Apps, too (43434).
Join script now uses --bindpwdfile options (47051).
Added update-certificates command to univention-appcenter (46789).
File permissions for /etc/machine.secret in app containers have been fixed (46823).
The &ucsUCRV;s ldap/base and ldap/server/* are passed to Docker Apps (46779).
The data directory is no longer moved to the backup directory during the uninstallation of an App (45670).
When the meta data of an App pointed to a setup script but it was missing, an error occurred (46752).
A text referring to the activation of UCS has been updated (46742).
Calling univention-upgrade non-interactively may have caused an error while upgrading Apps when run on a &ucsMaster; (46684).
While updating from UCS 4.2 to UCS 4.3, some Apps changed their version. This requires a re-registration of the Apps (46440).
The development tools did not prepend http:// to the call for zsyncmake (45830).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: Whether the simple or advanced search is shown upon opening a &ucsUDM; module can now be defined via the &ucsUCRV; directory/manager/web/modules/search/advanced_on_open (46910).
Fixed a typo in the German translation of the Release Policy (46348).
Prevent the removal of groups that are mentioned in the settings/default object. These groups are used for new objects and therefore must exist (44685).
Join script uses --bindpwdfile option, added --bindpwdfile support in univention-dnsedit (47052).
Properties that have been set to default values are no longer ignored when saving from the UDM detail page (46529).
Every installation of a Docker Apps adds one machine account. These do not count against the license anymore (41372).
The App opsi does add system users during the installation. These do not count against the license anymore (46334).
DNS entries on Computers are no longer allowed to have an empty forward or reverse zone. Setting it empty led to tracebacks (44389).

The email field in the Contacts tab of a user no longer has its value pre-filled with the value of the mailPrimaryAddress field. As the pre-filled value was not saved to LDAP, this led to undesired inconsistencies in the display of the actual data (45581).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: Ignore link local addresses in the &ucsUMC; IP change module (41052).
The privacy statement is now displayed directly in the &ucsUSS; wizard (46852).
The syntax check for the Hostname of the &ucsMaster; field on the Domain join information page in the &ucsUSS; has been changed to FQDN (IP addresses are no longer valid) (43276).
A link pointing to the Univention Privacy Policy has been added to the UCS activation process (46742).
Added support for --bindpwdfile during join (47064).
Added a link to the knowledge base article about join problems in the join error message (45514).
An error when joining a &ucsBackup; via the &ucsUMC; has been resolved (42986).
New join script keywords have been added to influence the parameters a join script is called with (46842).
The join tools now check if the join status file is a proper text file (46731).
The binddn of the &ucsMaster; Account is determined in a more robust way (36097).
A link pointing to the Univention Privacy Policy has been added to the UCS activation process (46742).
A new diagnostic plugin has been added to check whether the remote and the local version of the SAML identity and service certificates match (45515).
The ssh test does not fail anymore for computer objects that are not (43403).
Links to knowledge base articles now point to the correct addresses (46166).
Avoid paramiko log messages winding up in connector-s4.log (46708).
Only use FQDNs for the SSH connection checks (45370).
The output of actions is logged (46039).
Run nsupdate check only on Samba or Samba4 systems (45904).
The German name of the module was adjusted (46034).
Sometimes the 01_ssh_connection check was hanging (45343).
nsupdate checks in &ucsUAS; did not use the Slave PDCs (45584).
Check of the file system permissions of local mail directory has been added (46677).
Whether the simple or advanced search is shown upon opening a UDM module can now be defined via the &ucsUCRV; directory/manager/web/modules/search/advanced_on_open (46910).
The server count is no longer shown in the license information dialog because of confusion with the number of physical and virtual servers (45944).
Properties that have been set to default values are no longer ignored when saving from the UDM detail page (46529).
Fixed referencing objects not always being shown in the policies module (38674).
The type and position of an UDM object are displayed again on the detail page (46371).
The LDAP syntax for userPrimaryGroupPreset has been changed to DirectoryString (46288).
Added support for --bindpwdfile during join (47066).
Improve error logging and retry AD LDAP bind in case of ldap.OPERATIONS_ERROR during first LDAP search (41733).
A problem when simultaneously registering LDAP ACL and schema extension has been fixed (45033).
Improve debug output in lib.admember.lookup_adds_dc() (44478).
An error message when joining an AD domain was not printed correctly because a variable was used before its assignment (45967).
Fixed a typo when warning about an outdated UCS version (47097).
Make sure all services that are disabled while installing package updates are running at the end of the update by starting them explicitly (47029).
The update from 4.2 to 4.3 is now stopped if a failed.ldif is found (46850).
Fix the path to the dpkg-statoverride tool which is called during system setup (46847).
Links to knowledge base articles now point to the correct addresses (46166).
Added support for --bindpwdfile during join (47068, 46842).
When moving a user's mailbox to a different filesystem, set owner and group for all files on the target filesystem (46892).
When upgrading from a system that previously used Cyrus, the now deprecated mail quota policies can be removed using the script /usr/share/univention-mail-postfix/remove_mail_quota_policy (46454).
Added support for --bindpwdfile during join (47062).
Fixed permissions for Nagios log file (47015).
Added headers X-Forwarded-Proto and X-Forwarded-SSL so that certain Apps work correctly behind a proxy (44921).
Added support for --bindpwdfile during join (47058).
Fix warning during squid configuration reload (46565).
Remove obsolete hierarchy_stoplist directive (46567).
A wrapper is added to support non ASCII characters in passwords with basic authentication. Previously non ASCII characters did not work with IE (34154).
Added support for --bindpwdfile during join (47070).
Join script does not need credentials and added --bindpwdfile parameter to salt_krb5Keys (46842).
Fixed handling of expired certificates (45472).
Renewed certificates were not readable by &ucsBackup; (46203).
Added support for --bindpwdfile during join (47065).
Mask the service rpc-svcgssd for handling Kerberos tickets for NFS (46587).
Help the user decide which user to log in as at the KDE login screen (47026).

univention-system-setup has been removed from the list of packages to be installed along with univention-container-role-common. This role is used for Docker Apps and does not need univention-system-setup (45909).
Added support for --bindpwdfile during join (47060, 47059).
Adjust firewall to Samba 4.7 dynamic port range (46809).
Added a more detailed error message for the domain join (43223).
Locking in the sysvol-sync.sh has been fixed (46486).
A dependency to &ucsUAS; in the univention-samba join script has been removed (46006).
When objects are deleted or moved remove the their DN from both group member mapping caches. This affected &ucsUAS; (46682).
Added support for option --bindpwdfile during join (47061).
The &ucsUDL; module now restarts the connector if extended attributes are modified (46972).
Rejects for non-ASCII Samba/AD accounts are not handled properly due to sqlite encoding problem (47013).
In case &ucsUCRV; connector/s4/mapping/group/syncmode is set to write, the S4-Connector would still modify groups in OpenLDAP when a user was modified. This affected &ucsUAS; (46682).
Preserve case in DN during move sync from ucs to samba (46741).
connector-tracebacks.log is not written any longer (46798).
A mismatch between the samba and OpenLDAP SID for the host object after the connector initialization in &ucsUAS; has been fixed (40419).
Added support for --bindpwdfile during join (47096).
Improve error feedback for connectionFailed and failedADConnect exceptions (47091).
Some encoding in the context of rejects have been fixed (45779).
Update shadowMax, shadowLastChange and krb5PasswordEnd during password sync from AD to UCS, too (45760).
Output exception details in check_domain and admember_join (44478).
Fixed a typo when warning about an outdated UCS version (47097).
The link in the welcome dialog for sending feedback pointed to a wrong location in the French translation (45874).
Properly transition system jobs to system_cronjob_t SELinux context and stop relying on refpolicy specific identifiers (46629).
Ignore loop-back network interfaces lo and docker0 in univention-register-network-address (41052).
If more than one harddisk is detected during UCS installation, the target disk for the grub installer can be selected. (44595).
The univention-updater preup and postup scripts have been adapted for UCS 4.3-1. (47121).
